bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part IV. Great Britain (without British Museum London).
bibl.seg: Bruckner Albert and Robert Marichal, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part IV. Great Britain (without British Museum London).
Olten - Lausanne, Urs Graf Verlag, 1967, in fol., xxiii-102 pp., ill.

C.R. par B. Bischoff, HZ 223 (1976) pp. 689-696 (concerne aussi les Parts III et V). - Marcel Hombert, ChrEg 45 (1970) No. 89, pp. 200-204. - Arm. Petrucci, Gnomon 41 (1969) pp. 769-776. - Eric G. Turner, JEA 55 (1969) pp. 236-237. - Hans Julius Wolff, ZSav 86 (1969) pp. 560-561.
